""ğŸš¨ Needed: Creative and diligent social media manager and content creatorğŸš¨Scope:Stride is an online community platform focused on autoimmune conditions. We are the first of our kind in the Middle East and are about to launch the first version of our platform.We are looking for someone to join us on the journey by helping us create beautiful, emotive, and vibrant content for our Instagram that captures our values: [REDACTED_URL] is an initial 3-month contract for $300 per month ($900 total) but we are looking for someone to be with us long term.The individual for the job needs to have the following:1. Proven examples of content creation around health and wellness including graphic design and illustrations. This can also extend to caption writing.2. Experience and a methodology for managing an Instagram page, which will include: a monthly grid plan, working with content buckets, and follower interaction.3. Building out an ecosystem: finding and engaging with pages that add value to our community, and can be potential partners and promoters of our brand.4. Creating brand assets that can be repurposed and used across content for cohesion.Deliverables:We are doing several events in March to launch/promote our online platform so immediate deliverables are:1. Create content to showcase the platform, its features, and benefits.2. Create content to drive followers to sign up for the free version of the platform.3. Support in running ads.Post launch:1. Educational content - carousels, reels, stories.2. Event promotion.3. Community generated content.What we provide:1. Canva pro subscription2. Brand guidelines3. Extensive resource library made up of e-books and blogs4.
